| location          = * Can be found by following the Sanguine Harvest mini questline.
* You'll first see mention of the harvest in a [journal](/waterloggedJournal/) found in the [Bent Bough Forest](/bentBoughForest/). It will hint at [Arkemyr](/arkemyr/)'s name. Speaking with Arkemyr at his mansion, he'll say that he might have a [book](/theCultOfTheSanguineHarvest/) on the subject in his basement (you may have already acquired this earlier).
* The book hints at the 16th of the month as being important and a ritual involving a great sword. Travel to an island near [Rikuhu's Maw](/rikuhusMaw/) in the northwest corner of the map (the one with [Fampyr's Crypt](/fampyrsCrypt/) and [Bent Bough Forest](/bentBoughForest/)). Resting until the 16th of the month and then approaching the forest allows you to witness a sacrificial ritual involving a woman. If you choose to interrupt the ritual early you can save the woman. If you wait until after the sacrifice you can attack the cultists and receive this great sword as loot.  
| guid              = 033e27b2-3568-4f45-bc76-334279c20ee1
}}
